statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM patient_records WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE trial_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, gender, medical_condition FROM patient_records ORDER BY gender DESC, medical_condition ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, medical_condition, trial_end_date FROM patient_records WHERE trial_end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, drug_trial_id FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male' AND medical_condition LIKE '%Cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, dob, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE visit_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicaljsonRecords.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE trial_id = 1 ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Diabetes%' AND treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, visit_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Male' ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, record_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT trial_id, trial_location, doctor_name FROM Trials WHERE trial_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, trial_location FROM Patients JOIN Trials ON Patients.trial_id = Trials.trial_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, trial_location FROM Patients INNER JOIN Trials ON Patients.trial_id = Trials.trial_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND treatment NOT LIKE '%surgery%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, medication FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM drug_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 3 AND medication = 'Aspirin'
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM drug_trials ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT p.first_name, t.trial_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN trial_participants tp ON p.patient_id = tp.patient_id INNER JOIN drug_trials t ON t.trial_id = tp.trial_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE dosage >= 100;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, date_recorded, data FROM Records ORDER BY date_recorded LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, frequency, start_date, end_date FROM Patients p JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON t.medication_id = m.medication_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_recorded, data FROM Patients p JOIN Records r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.date_recorded = '2022-05-10';
